original_text:
Himalayas Roof of The World
Himalaya Roof of the World è una slot Barcrest a 5 rulli e 100 linee di pagamento che si basa sull’iconica catena montuosa. Con un tocco tibetano, è dotato di valanghe che lasciano una scia di Wilde sui rulli. Si tratta della funzione Free Spins Bonus, dove si può iniziare con un massimo di 20 giri gratuiti – i giri Wild si trasformano in doppi giri Icicle wilds che si espandono fino a coprire l’intero mulinello. C’è un simbolo della bussola che ti dà la possibilità di vincere più giri gratis dalla Mappa del Tesoro. Infine, c’è una funzione Big Bet dove si gioca a 5 giri collegati con soli 2 simboli bonus che attivano la funzione Free Spins Bonus (con un massimo di 50 giri gratuiti) dove si può giocare con simboli di basso valore rimossi e un mulinello wild in tutto.

Una grafica strabiliante
Himalaya Roof of the World è alimentato da Barcrest e viene fornito con 5 rulli, 10 file e 100 linee di pagamento. Giocabile da 0,10€ a 500 sterline a giro su tutti i dispositivi, è dotato di una funzione Snow Slide Bonus in cui si gioca in modo casuale dopo essere stati lasciati in seguito a una valanga. C’è anche una funzione Free Spins Bonus dove è possibile ottenere neve Wilda a caso, oltre ad espandere i simboli Wild Icicle. Infine, c’è anche una funzione Big Bet.
Himalaya Roof of the World si basa sulla catena montuosa in Asia che separa il subcontinente indiano dall’altopiano tibetano – si vede la montagna più alta del mondo, il Monte Everest, fare da sfondo. Con un tocco tibetano ai mulinelli, i simboli includono cuori, vanga, bastoni e diamanti, oltre a tende, picconi, tigri e aquile.
Vedrete anche dame tibetane e monaci tibetani che appaiono alti 3 simboli – il monaco è il simbolo di valore più alto dandovi 50 volte la vostra puntata per 5 su una linea di pagamento. C’è anche un simbolo di ghiaccio selvatico che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne la signora, il monaco e i simboli bonus. Quando si gioca a €2 o meno per giro, il ritorno al giocatore % è del 94% – se giocato più di €2, aumenta al 96%.
Quando si tratta di caratteristiche bonus, si ha la funzione Snow Slide Bonus che si attiva in modo casuale durante il gioco di base – una valanga si verifica con la neve che spazza i rulli. Come risultato, si spargono simboli Wild sui rulli che possono portare a una bella vittoria.

Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Poi c’è la funzione Free Spins Bonus che si gioca quando si ottengono 3, 4 o 5 simboli bonus Himalaya – questo vi ricompenserà con 8, 12 o 20 giri gratis rispettivamente. Ora, la funzione Snow Slide Bonus può essere attivata in qualsiasi momento durante i testacoda gratuiti per i rotazioni libere sui rulli. Inoltre, e cosa ancora più importante, i rulli contengono simboli Wild Icicle a doppia altezza che si espandono fino a riempire l’intero rullo!
Fate attenzione al simbolo della bussola sul mulinello 5, perché questo aumenta le possibilità di recuperare la funzione Free Spins Bonus – ogni bussola che appare sui rulli aumenterà il segmento vincente della bussola Mystery Free Spins di 1/5. L’ago gira poi per determinare se vincerai più giri gratis – sarai portato sulla mappa dell’Himalaya che contiene 4 piste. Ognuna di esse contiene un numero casuale di giri gratuiti che vengono aggiunti al totale.
Essendo uno slot Barcrest, Himalayas Roof of the World è dotato di una funzione Big Bet in cui si gioca una serie di 5 giri collegati – si può scegliere tra un’opzione da 20, 30 e 50 sterline. L’opzione €20 richiede 2 o più simboli bonus per attivare la funzione Free Spins Bonus – 2, 3, 4 o 5 simboli bonus vi daranno 8, 12, 20 o 50 giri gratuiti.
Lo stesso vale per l’opzione €30, ma tutti i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi dai rulli. Nell’opzione €50, si ottiene tutto quanto sopra e 1 bobina è completamente wild. Infine, il RTP% aumenta al 97,75%.
Visivamente, l’Himalaya Roof of the World è bellissimo e ha un’opera d’arte mozzafiato – in termini di caratteristiche bonus, mi piace la funzione Snow Slide Bonus che può risultare in un sacco di wilds aggiunti alle bobine. Migliora nella funzione Free Spins Bonus, in quanto si dispone di bobine di Icicle wilds a doppia altezza che si espandono per dare bobine completamente selvagge.

Altre Slot Machine simili
La variante è nel mezzo, con vittorie massime di 500 volte la tua puntata su ogni testacoda. Vi consiglio anche di provare altre slot Barcrest con Hercules High & Mighty, una buona scelta. Prova subito le altre Slot Machine prodotte da Barcrest per provare la stessa adrenalina che hai provato giocando a Himalaya Roof of The World.

raw_translation.response:
Himalayas Roof of The World is a must-try slot game by Barcrest that boasts 5 reels and 100 paylines inspired by the iconic mountain range. Tibetan elements are added to the game including an avalanche feature that creates a trail of wilds across the reels. Its highlight is the Free Spins Bonus feature where you get up to 20 free spins – where wild spins transform into double Icicle Wild spins that expand to cover the entire reel. With the compass symbol, you can win more free spins on the Treasure Map. And don’t forget the Big Bet feature where you play 5 consecutive spins with only 2 bonus symbols needed to activate the Free Spins Bonus (up to 50 free spins) where low-value symbols are removed and a Wild reel is added.

The game that boasts stunning graphics is powered by Barcrest and has 5 reels, 10 rows and 100 paylines. Playable from €0.10 to €500 per spin on any device, it has a Snow Slide Bonus feature randomly activated after an avalanche that rewards wild symbols across the reels that may lead to big wins. The Free Spins Bonus feature includes random Snow Wilds and expanding Icicle Wild symbols. Finally, it includes a Big Bet feature.

Himalayas Roof of the World is inspired by the Himalayan mountain range that separates the Indian subcontinent from the Tibetan Plateau - with the highest mountain in the world, Mount Everest as the background. With Tibetan symbols such as hearts, shovels, sticks, diamonds, tents, picks, tigers, eagles, and even Tibetan ladies and monks standing 3 symbols high. The latter is the highest paying symbol, giving you 50 times your bet for 5 on a payline. There is also an Ice Wild symbol that replaces all symbols except the Lady, the Monk and the Bonus symbols. When played at €2 or less per spin, the RTP is 94% – and when played above €2 in bet, it shoots up to 96%.

As for the bonus features, the Snow Slide Bonus feature randomly activates during the base game when there is an avalanche that spreads wild symbols across the reels resulting in big wins. Then there’s the Free Spins Bonus feature where getting 3, 4, or 5 Himalayan Bonus symbols gives you 8, 12, or 20 free spins respectively. Also, the Snow Slide Bonus feature can be reactivated during free spins. And most importantly, the reels contain double-height Icicle Wild symbols that expand to cover the entire reel!

Keep an eye on the compass symbol on reel 5, as this increases the chances of triggering the Free Spins Bonus feature – every compass that appears on the reels will increase the winning segment of the Mystery Free Spins compass by 1/5. The needle then spins to determine if you will win more free spins – you’ll be taken to the Himalayan map that contains 4 trails. Each of which contains a random number of free spins that are added to the total. 

As a Barcrest slot, Himalayas Roof of the World also comes with a Big Bet feature where you play a series of 5 rolls linked together - you can chose between options costing €20, €30, and €50. The €20 option requires 2 or more bonus symbols to activate the Free Spins Bonus feature – 2, 3, 4 or 5 bonus symbols will give you 8, 12, 20 or 50 free spins. The same goes for the €30 option, but all low value symbols are removed from the reels. In the €50 option, you get the same as above but with 1 wild reel. Finally, the RTP% increases to 97,75%.

Visually, Himalayas Roof of the World is beautiful and features stunning artwork – in terms of bonus features, we like the Snow Slide Bonus feature that can add more wilds to the reels. It gets even better in the Free Spins Bonus feature, where you get double-height Icicle wild reels that expand to form full wild reels.

We also recommend trying other Barcrest slots such as Hercules High & Mighty, for those who want the same adrenaline rush as playing Himalayas Roof of The World.

Himalayas Roof of The World – A Slot Masterpiece!

Get ready to explore the iconic mountain range in Asia, Himalayas Roof of The World by Barcrest is a 5-reel and 100-payline slot game, featuring incredible graphics and tibetan touch. The game has a Snow Slide Bonus feature that adds more wilds to the reels that can lead to big wins. The Free Spins Bonus feature is where you can win up to 20 free spins and have the chance to play with a variety of icy wild symbols that expand to cover the entire reel.

The game has a stunning backdrop of the world's highest mountain, Mount Everest. The symbols include hearts, spades, diamonds, as well as tents, picks, tigers, and eagles. You'll also see Tibetan women and monks that appear three symbols high, with the monk being the highest value symbol, giving 50 times your stake for five on a payline. When played at €2 or lower per spin, the return to player (RTP) is 94%, but if played over €2, it increases to 96%. 

Apart from the Snow Slide Bonus, there's also a Free Spins Bonus feature that's triggered by landing three or more Himalaya bonus symbols. The feature comes with the addition of icy wild symbols, which can lead to more big wins. Moreover, the Compass symbol on reel 5 can increase your chances of winning more free spins – every time a compass appears, the winning segment on the Mystery Free Spins compass increases by one-fifth. You will then be taken to the Himalayan map, divided into four tracks, each containing a random number of free spins that are added to the total.

The game also has a Big Bet feature, where you can play five connected spins, choosing from options of €20, €30, or €50 per spin. The €20 option requires two or more bonus symbols to trigger the Free Spins Bonus feature, while the €30 option removes all low-value symbols from the reels. In the €50 option, one reel becomes completely wild. The RTP% increases to 97.75% in this feature.

Overall, Himalayas Roof of The World is an absolute masterpiece, with its exceptional graphics and unique features. If you're a seasoned player, you should definitely try this game, along with Hercules High & Mighty and other Barcrest slots, to experience the thrill of the mountains and the excitement of big wins.

The game that boasts stunning graphics is powered by Barcrest and has 5 reels, 10 rows and 100 paylines. Himalayas Roof of the World is inspired by the Himalayan mountain range that separates the Indian subcontinent from the Tibetan Plateau - with the highest mountain in the world, Mount Everest as the background. With Tibetan symbols such as hearts, shovels, sticks, diamonds, tents, picks, tigers, eagles, and even Tibetan ladies and monks standing 3 symbols high. The latter is the highest paying symbol, giving you 50 times your bet for 5 on a payline. There is also an Ice Wild symbol that replaces all symbols except the Lady, the Monk and the Bonus symbols. As for the bonus features, the Snow Slide Bonus feature randomly activates during the base game when there is an avalanche that spreads wild symbols across the reels resulting in big wins. Then there’s the Free Spins Bonus feature where getting 3, 4, or 5 Himalayan Bonus symbols gives you 8, 12, or 20 free spins respectively. Also, the Snow Slide Bonus feature can be reactivated during free spins. And most importantly, the reels contain double-height Icicle Wild symbols that expand to cover the entire reel!

Keep an eye on the compass symbol on reel 5, as this increases the chances of triggering the Free Spins Bonus feature – every compass that appears on the reels will increase the winning segment of the Mystery Free Spins compass by 1/5. The needle then spins to determine if you will win more free spins – you’ll be taken to the Himalayan map that contains 4 trails. Each of which contains a random number of free spins that are added to the total. 

As a Barcrest slot, Himalayas Roof of the World also comes with a Big Bet feature where you play a series of 5 rolls linked together - you can chose between options costing €20, €30, and €50. The €20 option requires 2 or more bonus symbols to activate the Free Spins Bonus feature – 2, 3, 4 or 5 bonus symbols will give you 8, 12, 20 or 50 free spins. The same goes for the €30 option, but all low value symbols are removed from the reels. In the €50 option, you get the same as above but with 1 wild reel. Finally, the RTP% increases to 97,75%.

Visually, Himalayas Roof of the World is beautiful and features stunning artwork – in terms of bonus features, we like the Snow Slide Bonus feature that can add more wilds to the reels. It gets even better in the Free Spins Bonus feature, where you get double-height Icicle wild reels that expand to form full wild reels.

We also recommend trying other Barcrest slots such as Hercules High & Mighty, for those who want the same adrenaline rush as playing Himalayas Roof of The World.
